primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the remote control from the table
Place the remote on the couch behind the blue pillow

annotation: Put a remote control on the couch.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the remote
Put the remote down
Pick up the remote
Put the remote down on the table

annotation: Move two remotes to the center table.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the keys that are to the left of the laptop.
Put the keys on the bottom right shelf.
Pick up the set of keys on the cushion.
Put these keys near where you put the first set.

annotation: Put two sets of keys on the shelf.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the blue bowl from the left side of the television stand.
Put the blue bowl on the back left corner of the table to the left of the laptop computer.

annotation: Place a bowl on a table.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the credit card on the left from the table.
Turn on the lamp.

annotation: Examine the credit card by the light of the lamp.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the egg in the sink.
Put the egg in the microwave.

annotation: Put an egg in the microwave.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the pot on the front burner.
Place the pot on the counter on the left of the sink.
Pick up the apple inside the sink.
Place the apple inside the pot on the counter.
Pick up the knife inside the sink.
Cut the apple inside the pot.

annotation: Cut an apple inside a pot.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the spoon.
Open the refrigerator.  Put the spoon on the pan in the refrigerator.
Grab the pan out of the refrigerator with the spoon.
Put the pan with the spoon on the counter.

annotation: Put a spoon in a pan on the counter.

primitive_skills.annotations: pick up the measuring spoon
put the spoon in the bowl in the cabinet to the left below the sink
pick up the bowl and spoon from the cabinet
put the bowl on the counter

annotation: Put a bowl and spoon on the counter.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the spoon on the table, to the left of the apple.
Wash the spoon in the sink.
Place the spoon on the table to the right of the loaf of bread.

annotation: Put a clean spoon on the table.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the frying pan on the bottom left burner.
Open the fridge and place the frying pan on the top shelf to the right and close the door letting it chill for a while before retrieving it and closing the door.
Place the frying pan back on the stove but on the top left burner this time.

annotation: Place a chilled frying pan on the stove.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the yellow handled knife from the table
Open the top drawer and place the knife inside
Pick up the yellow handled knife from the table
Open the top drawer and place the knife inside

annotation: Putting away yellow handled knives in the drawer.

primitive_skills.annotations: Take a knife from the table
Slice potato on the counter
Put the knife on the fridge
Grab a slice of potato
Put the potato slice in the fridge and take it out again
Put the potato slice in the microwave

annotation: Slice the potato, put slice in fridge, put it in the microwave.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the tomato from the counter next to the microwave.
Place the tomato on the top shelf in the fridge, close the door, and then open the door to remove it after a few seconds.
Place the tomato in the microwave.

annotation: Put a cold tomato in the microwave.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the potato from the right sink basin.
Open the microwave, put the potato inside and heat it up, then take the potato out.
Put the potato in the right sink basin.

annotation: Put a warm potato in the sink.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the closest chef's knife to you.
Slice the tomato in the sink.
Set the chef's knife on top of the other chef's knife.
Pick up a slice of tomato.
Heat the tomato slice in the microwave.
Set the tomato clice down to the right of the chef's knife.

annotation: Set a heated tomato slice on the island.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the yellow knife in front of you.
Slice the lettuce that is in the middle of the counter.
Put the knife in the fridge.
Pick up a slice of lettuce.
Put the slice of lettuce in the fridge, close the door, wait, take the slice back out.
Put the slice of lettuce in the sink.

annotation: Cut a slice of lettuce, chill it and put it in the sink.

primitive_skills.annotations: pick up a knife from the counter
clean the knife in the sink
put the knife in the drawer to the left of the dishwasher

annotation: Put a cleaned knife in a drawer.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the egg that is on the kitchen island, in front of the tomato.
Heat up the egg in the microwave before taking it back out.
Place the egg on the kitchen island, above the oven.

annotation: Place a heated egg on the kitchen island.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up apple from the table.
Open the fridge, place the apple on the top shelf inside the fridge, close the fridge for the apple to cool down, open the fridge and take out the apple.
Place the apple in the bin.

annotation: Place a cool apple in the white bin.

primitive_skills.annotations: pick up the lettuce on the table
put the lettuce into the sink and fill it with water then drain the sink and remove the lettuce
put the lettuce down on the counter

annotation: Rinse off lettuce and put it down on the counter top.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the large metal spoon white a black handle off of the round white table.
Wash the large metal spoon in the kitchen sink, then pick it back up.
Place the clean large metal spoon on the table to the left of the loaves of bread.

annotation: Put a clean large metal spoon on the round white table.

primitive_skills.annotations: grab the cup in the coffee machine
open the refrigerator, put the cup in, wait for a while, take the cup out
put the cup in the coffee machine

annotation: Cool the cup in the refrigerator, put it in the coffee machine.

primitive_skills.annotations: pick up the knife from the counter
slice up the tomato on the counter
put knife in the trash can
pick up a tomato slice from the counter
open the microwave and place tomato in shut the door and
throw the tomato in the trash

annotation: To cook a sliced tomato to throw it in the trash.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the knife
Cut the tomato
Put the knife in the pan
Take a tomato slice
Put the tomato in the pan
Pick up the pan
Put the pan in the fridge

annotation: Put a pan with a knife and a tomato slice in it in the fridge.
